Package geometries

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Intersectable
    Intersectable is an interface for intersectable by ray geometries
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Cylinder
    class Cylinder representing a cylinder in a 3D cartesian coordinate system the class inherit from Tube
    CylinderTest
    Testing Cylinder
    Geometries
    Geometries representing collection of geometries shapes, as part of implementing composite design pattern
    GeometriesTest
    Testing Geometries
    Geometry
    Geometry is interface for geometric shapes
    Intersectable.GeoPoint
    GeoPoint is helper class used to link Point3D to the geometry in which it is located
    Plane
    class Plane representing a plane in a 3D cartesian coordinate system
    PlaneTest
    Testing Plane
    Polygon
    Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
    PolygonTest
    Testing Polygons
    Sphere
    class Sphere representing a sphere in a 3D cartesian coordinate system
    SphereTest
    Testing Sphere
    Triangle
    class Triangle representing a triangle in a 3D cartesian coordinate system the class inherit from Polygon
    TriangleTest
    Testing Triangle
    Tube
    class Tube representing a tube in a 3D cartesian coordinate system
    TubeTest
    Testing Tube
